DOC.brief_summary: Obesity epidemic Western society big risk factor insulin resistance type 2 diabetes . The investigator preliminary evidence show hyperbaric oxygen therapy rapidly increase insulin sensitivity human . This require confirmation large population , study investigator also test mechanism occurs . The investigator suspect modulation hypoxia stress response proteins follow change tissue oxygenation may contribute improvement . This study potential yield new important insight insulin resistance obesity .
DOC.brief_title: Hyperbaric Oxygen Treatment Ameliorates Insulin Resistance
DOC.criteria: Obese men without type 2 diabetes age 4570 Lean men without type 2 diabetes age 4570 smoker claustrophobic sleep apnoea blood donor exercise 2 time per week certain medication eg : bleomycin , corticosteroid
